response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am extending a special offer to purchase this item at a price of $950,000. This represents a significant investment, but it also guarantees you the chance to own a piece that aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations. I am confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing unparalleled benefits and satisfaction. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can arrange for the transaction to be completed promptly.", "product_price": 950000}
